SELECT c.cart_no, c.product_no, p.product_name, c.cart_qty, p.product_price, pi.product_image_no, pi.product_image_file, ps.product_selected_no, psd.product_selected_detail_no, po.product_option_no, po.product_option_type, pod.product_option_detail_no, pod.product_option_detail_name, pod.product_option_detail_price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.product_no=c.product_no JOIN product_image pi ON p.product_no=pi.product_no JOIN product_selected ps ON c.cart_no=ps.cart_no JOIN product_selected_detail psd ON ps.product_selected_no=psd.product_selected_no JOIN product_option_detail pod ON psd.product_option_detail_no=pod.product_option_detail_no JOIN product_option po ON pod.product_option_no=po.product_option_no WHERE c.customer_no=#{customerNo}
